about.title: About Us
about.content: Chengdu Bar Calendar is a platform dedicated to providing the latest and most comprehensive bar event information for nightlife enthusiasts in Chengdu. We collect and organize event information from various bars, making it easy for you to stay updated with Chengdu's nightlife scene.
